languages.text: "Ты не обязан умирать, старик. Если она вышла из строя — пришло время ее отпустить".

traits.locale_text: "Ты не обязан умирать, старик. Если она вышла из строя — пришло время ее отпустить".

languages.text: "You do not have to die, old man. If she has been taken out of service, then the time has come to release her."
languages.original_text: "Ты не обязан умирать, старик. Если она вышла из строя — пришло время ее отпустить".

traits.locale_text: "You do not have to die, old man. If she has been taken out of service, then the time has come to release her."
"You do not have to die, old man. If she has been taken out of service, then the time has come to release her."
"You do not have to die, old man. If she has been taken out of service, then the time has come to release her."
"You do not have to die, old man. If she has been taken out of service, then the time has come to release her."

languages.text: “你没必要去死，老家伙。既然她已经无法继续服侍了，那她也该获得解脱了。”
languages.original_text: "You do not have to die, old man. If she has been taken out of service, then the time has come to release her."

traits.locale_text: “你没必要去死，老家伙。既然她已经无法继续服侍了，那她也该获得解脱了。”

languages.text: «No tiene que morir, anciano. Si ya no está en servicio, es hora de liberarla».
languages.original_text: "You do not have to die, old man. If she has been taken out of service, then the time has come to release her."

traits.locale_text: «No tiene que morir, anciano. Si ya no está en servicio, es hora de liberarla».

languages.text: 「死ぬ必要はない、ご老人。労務を外れれば、すぐに孫は解放される」
languages.original_text: "You do not have to die, old man. If she has been taken out of service, then the time has come to release her."

traits.locale_text: 「死ぬ必要はない、ご老人。労務を外れれば、すぐに孫は解放される」

languages.text: « Rien ne vous oblige à vous sacrifier, vieil homme. Si elle a été déclarée hors d'usage, c'est que l'heure de sa délivrance est arrivée. »
languages.original_text: "You do not have to die, old man. If she has been taken out of service, then the time has come to release her."

traits.locale_text: « Rien ne vous oblige à vous sacrifier, vieil homme. Si elle a été déclarée hors d'usage, c'est que l'heure de sa délivrance est arrivée. »

languages.text: "Ihr müsst nicht sterben, alter Mann. Wenn sie aus dem Dienst genommen wurde, kann sie jetzt freigegeben werden."
languages.original_text: "You do not have to die, old man. If she has been taken out of service, then the time has come to release her."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst nicht sterben, alter Mann. Wenn sie aus dem Dienst genommen wurde, kann sie jetzt freigegeben werden."

languages.text: "Ölmek zorunda değilsin ihtiyar. Madem kız hizmet dışı, o hâlde azat etmenin vakti gelmiş demektir."
languages.original_text: "You do not have to die, old man. If she has been taken out of service, then the time has come to release her."

traits.locale_text: "Ölmek zorunda değilsin ihtiyar. Madem kız hizmet dışı, o hâlde azat etmenin vakti gelmiş demektir."
